info.title: Dont Get Crushed
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
Dont Get Crushed is a simple Falling Balls style game. Just tilt your wiimote to move from side to side and avoid the balls as they bounce accross the screen.

This game has an online leaderboard.

Author:
ThatOtherPerson (thatotherperson@yahoo.com)
ThatOtherDev.com
